titleStmt.title: Doubtings dovvnfall first, prouing the communitie of the Saints assurance. Secondly, disprouing Bellarmines and his fellowes false allegations and friuolous exceptions against that truth. By Edvvard Dalton, preacher of the Word, &c.
titleStmt.author: Dalton, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; cropped at foot.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
